body:
Hello Everyone,


Registration for the 2011 international Radiance workshop is now open:
http://www.regonline.com/Register/Checkin.aspx?EventID=985545


Costs are as follows:
Seminar (Aug 24): $90
Workshop(Aug 25-26): $170
Both Seminar & Workshop (Aug 24-26): $260
There is a $30 discount for workshop presenters.  Please don't forget to email me (amcneil at lbl.gov) your presentation title and description.


More information about the workshop can be found here:
http://www.radiance-online.org/radiance-workshop10/


We're only 2 months away!  I look forward to seeing everyone!
Andy
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2011-June/007945.html).</sup>
